articles.title: Creators and Artistes of Meritorious Services Commended
articles.content:
Creators, Artistes of Meritorious Services Commended
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Creators, artistes and officials were officially commended with due ceremony on Wednesday in recognition of their meritorious services rendered for creating the drama "A Sentry under a Neon Lamp". 
					 After a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly was read out, the title of labor hero and gold medal (hammer and sickle) and the Order of National Flag first class and the title of Merited Artiste were awarded to Kim Myong Su, artist of the Phibada Opera Troupe.
					
					 Watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung were awarded to section chief Hwang Mun Il, Director Cha Jin Sam and Actress Ryu Yang Suk of the State Theatrical Troupe, and citations of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, to Secretary of the Primary Party Committee of the troupe Kim Ran Ok, Actor Pak Kon Chol and Actress Rim Kwang Sun. 
					
					 The title of People's Actor went to Actor Kim Su Il and the title of People's Actress to Actress Kim Chun Rim, the titles of Merited Actor to actors Sin Tae Sik, Kim Ul Myong, Mun Chol Ho and Choe Sung Hon and the title of Merited Artist to Director Jang Chan Guk. 
					
					 The Orders of National Flag first class were conferred upon five persons and Orders of Labor upon 11 persons. Orders and medals also went to many other creators, artistes and officials.

articles.title: DPRK Draws 0-0 with Brazilian Club
articles.content:
DPRK Draws 0-0 with Brazilian Club
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A football match between the DPRK team and the Brazilian team (the Atletico Sorocaba Club) was held at the Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang on Thursday. 
					 The match held amid the interests of many football experts and fans and working people ended in a tie with no score.
					
					 The DPRK team, which obtained qualification for 2010 FIFA World Cup in June, held games with foreign football teams.
					
					 It drew 0-0 respectively in the matches with the French Nantes Football Team and the Congo National Football Team held in October.

articles.title: Gravity-Fed Drinking Water Services
articles.content:
Gravity-Fed Waterway Changes Meaning of Miru Plain
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A gravity-fed drinking water project has been completed in Unsan County, North Phyongan Province shortly ago so as to supply quality spring water to the residents in the county.
					 These years have witnessed the completion of gravity-fed drinking water service projects in different parts of the DPRK.
					
					 Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province is providing the inhabitants with the water of the Osi Stream, the water quality of which is not inferior to the famous Sindok spring water.
					
					 Similar projects were also undertaken in Rason City, Sinuiju City of North Phyongan Province, Haeju City and Pyoksong County of South Hwanghae Province and Songgan County of Jagang Province, thus supplying clean water to the residents in the cities and county-towns.
					
					 The gravity-fed water system is economically profitable as it saves large amounts of electricity and manpower and does not use water pumping equipment.

articles.title: Gravity-Fed Waterway Changes Meaning of Miru Plain
articles.content:
Gravity-Fed Waterway Changes Meaning of Miru Plain
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The completion of a gravity-fed waterway project has changed the meaning of the Miru Plain in North Hwanghae Province.
					 Before the liberation of the country, the plain was called a place unfit for habitation.
					
					 Then many people abandoned the land with bitter tears as they could not gather in even seeds for next year's farming owing to severe drought.
					
					 Right after the liberation, President Kim Il Sung visited the place on several occasions to fix the site of a reservoir and indicate the ways for converting the plain into fertile soil.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of the President gigantic nature-remaking projects had been undertaken to consolidate the success in irrigation and complete it on a higher level, with the result that water of the Nam and Ryesong rivers were pumped to do farming on a safe basis.
					
					In accordance with General Secretary Kim Jong Il's far-reaching plan for turning the Miru Plain into a granary, a gravity-fed waterway project has been completed as a monumental creature of the times. As a result, the agricultural working people are doing farming without worries about water while economizing large amounts of electricity.
					
					 They say the Miru Plain, which had been abandoned in the past, has been converted into a granary full of happiness.

articles.title: Pyongyang Taedongmun Kindergarten Produces Many Music Prodigies
articles.content:
Pyongyang Taedongmun Kindergarten Produces Many Music Prodigies
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- There are many kindergartens producing music prodigies in the DPRK.
					Famous among them is the Pyongyang Taedongmun Kindergarten.
					
					 The kindergarten has covered a proud road of development as a reliable base for early musical education in the country under the warm care of the peerlessly great men.
					
					With a penetration into the importance of the kindergarten education in the work for raising talented artistes, General Secretary Kim Jong Il has directed deep attention to the work from long ago.
					
					 In the closing years of the 1970s he saw to it that early musical classes for teaching the fundamentals for playing violin and kayagum were set up in the kindergartens and sufficient material conditions for the education including various kinds of musical instruments and acoustic devices were supplied to them.
					
					 Having over 10 rooms for training violin, kayagum and sight reading, the kindergarten looks like a small "conservatory".
					
					 The kindergarten properly applies teaching methods in accordance with the law of development of intellectual faculties and practical ability of kindergarteners while selecting those with instinct for music in a systematic way, thus helping children lay a solid musical foundation.
					
					 Over last three decades not a small number of graduates of the kindergarten were awarded the February 16 Art Prize. In particular, Mun Kyong Jin placed first in an international violin concours.
					
					 Now they are active in the State Symphony Orchestra, Mansudae Art Troupe and other renowned art troupes of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on U.S. Policy of Hegemony on Verge of Bankruptcy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on U.S. Policy of Hegemony on Verge of Bankruptcy
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The first decade of the second millennium can be described in a word as a period in which the U.S. policy of hegemony, a policy for uni-polar world is going bankrupt and there opened a bright prospect for global independence and a multi-polar world.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It cites facts that up until the first half of the decade the U.S. got self-conceited and extreme arrogant, styling itself the world's "only superpower" but in its latter half it was compelled to admit that the situation has changed.
					
					 When looking back on the last decade, a lot of changes took place in the world balance of forces with the U.S. pullout of the ABM treaty, the war in Iraq and the financial crisis, etc. as major momentums, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. policy of uni-polar world and hegemony depending on its strength is on the verge of bankruptcy whereas global independence and multi-polarization are being rapidly accelerated, becoming a main trend of the times.
					
					 The EU, Southeast Asia, Africa and Latin America are confidently heading for regional unity and integration. There emerge new regional military and economic organizations excluding the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. dollar is pushed aside in the international currency system and various regional bank notes and currencies make their appearances, exercising influence.
					
					 There emerged a G-20 Summit involving developing countries, increasing the say and position of the developing countries in handling world economic issues.
					
					 The U.S. is finding itself in a tighter corner as the days go by, thrown into bottomless pits in Afghanistan and Iraq.
					
					 This is evidenced by the U.S. cancellation of its plan to build a missile shield in Eastern Europe and the rebuff and condemnation of the U.S. wrong policy of hegemony, its policy for uni-polar world not only by many countries of the world but by its allies, etc.
					
					 As seen above, the hegemonic position of the U.S. as the world's "only superpower" is rapidly sinking whereas the movement for global independence and a multi-polar world has become an irresistible trend of the times.

articles.title: Every Korean Urged to Swim with Trend of Times in National Interests
articles.content:
Every Korean Urged to Swim with Trend of Times in National Interests
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- It is most important for the Koreans to place the interests common to the nation above anything else in solving the national issue and the issue of the inter-Korean relations.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 For the Koreans nothing is more vital requirements and interests common to them than to achieve national reunification.
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the patriotic reunification programmes for meeting the requirements and interests common to the nation.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration deals with issues of achieving national reunification independently in the spirit of "By our nation itself."
					
					 The October 4 declaration clarifies the practical ways of definitely turning the inter-Korean relations into those of respect and confidence, putting an end to the military confrontation and building a lasting peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula on the basis of the reconfirmation of the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The implementation of the inter-Korean declarations is an unavoidable task of the times that should be implemented to meet the requirements and interests of the Korean nation in all fields.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the said declarations have been proved in reality.
					
					 The major projects for economic cooperation between the north and the south have got up steam again thanks to the north's magnanimity and they are supported and hailed by different circles of the south Korean society.
					
					 It has become an irresistible trend of the times to dynamically turn out to implement the inter-Korean declarations for the reconciliation and unity of the north and the south and national reunification.
					
					 It is a behavior guided by national conscience to put the interests common to the nation before those of an individual or a grouping and it is a wise attitude of any person in authority or a politician to know how to subordinate a trifle to something big, aware of the trend of the times.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by WPC
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by WPC
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Executive Committee of the World Peace Council was held in Syria from Oct. 23 to 25 with delegates of 33 countries of Asia, Europe and Americas in attendance. It expressed full support for the just cause of the Korean people.
					 A special resolution on solidarity with the DPRK adopted at the meeting noted that it is one of the key issues arising in ensuring peace and stability in Asia and the rest of the world at present to get the divided Korean Peninsula reunified and bring peace and stability to it.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK, immediately respond to the DPRK-U.S. talks for the normalization of the relations with the DPRK, replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace accord, withdraw its forces from south Korea and halt the war exercises for aggression.
					
					 Holding that Korea should be reunified independently and peacefully on the basis of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration recognized and supported by the UN General Assembly, the resolution called on the peace-loving people and organizations in the world to conduct the widespread international activities to support the just cause of the Korean people in 2010 which will mark the lapse of 65 years since the division of Korea by foreign forces and the passage of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean war and the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Meanwhile, a final communique released at the meeting voiced opposition to the imperialists' enforcement of the double-dealing policy in dealing with the nuclear issue and supported the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the reunification of the country peacefully on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Meeting of Solidarity with Korean People Held in France
articles.content:
Meeting of Solidarity with Korean People Held in France
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in France on Oct. 26 on the month of supporting the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 40th anniversary of the formation of the France-Korea Friendship Association. 
					 Andre Aubry, delegate president of the association, addressing the meeting, said that the Korean people have resolutely frustrated the ceaseless moves of the imperialist forces against the DPRK, firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the association has conducted activities for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people with main emphasis put on opposing the presence of the U.S. forces in south Korea, putting an end to the interference of the U.S. in the Korean issues and supporting the implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration over the past four decades since its formation.
					
					 He reiterated the determination to make positive efforts to boost the exchange and cooperation between the DPRK and France in various fields in the future, too and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 Guy Dupre, vice-president of the association, in a speech said that the proposal for founding the DFRK set forth by Kim Il Sung is the most just one and expressed his will to intensify the movement for supporting the proposal.
					
					A message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Premiados creadores, artistas y funcionarios ameritados
articles.content:
Premiados creadores, artistas y funcionarios ameritados
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 la ceremonia de premiacion a los creadores, artistas y funcionarios ameritados en la creacion del drama "Centinela bajo la lampara de neon".
					Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, se le concedieron al pintor del Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre, Kim Myong Su, el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la Medalla de Oro (El Martillo y la Hoz), la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase y el titulo de Artista Benemerito. 
					
					Recibieron el reloj con la inscripcion del nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung el jefe de seccion Hwang Mun Il, el director Cha Jin Sam y la actriz Ryu Yang Suk del Conjunto Dramatico Nacional.
					
					La secretaria de la Organizacion Primaria del Partido del Conjunto Dramatico Nacional Kim Ran Ok y los actores de la misma entidad, Pak Kon Chol y Rim Kwang Sun, fueron condecorados con el Diploma de Reconocimiento del Dirigente           Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Kim Su Il y Kim Chun Rim se hicieron Actores del Pueblo, Sin Tae Sik, Kim Ul Myong, Mun Chol Ho y Choe Sung Hon, Actores Benemeritos.
					
					Al director Jang Chan Guk le fue conferido el titulo de Artista Benemerito.
					
					Las ordenes y medallas fueron entregadas a muchos otros creadores, artistas y funcionarios, por ejemplo, la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase y la Orden del Trabajo a 5 y 11, respectivamente.

articles.title: Jardin Infantil Taedongmun de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Jardin Infantil Taedongmun de Pyongyang
  Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Corea tiene muchos jardines infantiles que forman a los "ninos prodigiosos de la musica".
					  Entre ellos figura el famoso Jardin Infantil Taedongmun de Pyongyang.
					
					   Gracias a la cordial benevolencia del Presidente            Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, este jardin se ha hecho una confiable base de la educacion primitiva de la musica del pais.
					
					    El Dirigente adivino temprano la importancia de la educacion del periodo del jardin infantil en la formacion del personal artistico y presto profunda atencion a esta labor.
					
					  A fines de la decada de 1970, el Dirigente hizo organizar en el citado jardin infantil el grupo primitivo de musica donde instruye exclusivamente a los ninos la base de ejecucion de violin y kayagum (instrumento musical coreano de cuerdas) y asegurar suficientemente todas las condiciones materiales necesarias a la labor docente inclusive varios instrumentos musicales y equipos de sonido.
					
					  Por lo tanto estan alli acondicionadas comodamente mas de 10 salas de ensenanza de violin, de kayagum y de solfa y preparadas todas las condiciones educativas, con lo cual hace  recordar, al pie de la letra, un pequeno "conservatorio".
					
					   Este plantel docente selecciona sistematicamente a los ninos con talento musical y aplica correctamente el metodo docente conforme a la inteligencia de los ninos y la legitimidad de desarrollo de su capacidad  practica para que estos dispongan de firme base musical.
					
					  Durante 30 anos pasados, de entre los graduados de este jardin infantil salieron el ejecutante Mun Kyong Jin quien ocupo primer lugar en el Concurso Internacional de Violin de Kaneti y numerosos premiados con el Premio Artistico 16 de Febrero.
					
					 Ahora ellos actuan en las entidades artisticas prestigiosas del pais como la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional y el Conjunto Artistico Mansudae.

articles.title: Cambiada llanura Miru
articles.content:
Cambiada llanura Miru 
 Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ATCC) --  Recientemente, termino la obra del canal de fluencia natural para la llanura Miru situada en la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte de Corea.
					  Antes de la liberacion de la patria, alli se llamaba un lugar donde no podia vivir la gente por falta del agua.
					
					  No habian podido cosechar ni siquiera las semillas en la agricultura de un ano debido a la sequia. Por eso, los campesinos abandonaron esta llanura derramando las lagrimas. Por esta razon este lugar se llamaba "campo Miru" o "llanura Miru".
					
					  Inmediatamente despues de la liberacion, el Presidente Kim Il Sung visito varias veces ahi donde fijo el solar de presa e ilumino el rumbo y medios de convertir dicha llanura en la tierra fertil.
					
					  Gracias a la sabia direccion del Presidente en este lugar se libro energicamente la labor de gran transformacion de la naturaleza para consolidar los exitos de irrigacion y se cultivo con seguridad la tierra irrigando el agua de los rios Nam y Ryesong.
					
					  Segun el gran proposito del Dirigente Kim Jong Il de convertirla en una base de produccion de cereales, se construyo excelentemente alli el canal de fluencia natural como creacion monumental, lo cual permite cultivar la tierra sin preocupacion de agua aun ahorrando gran cantidad de electricidad.
					
					  Ahora, los moradores ahi dicen por unanimidad que la "llanura Miru", otrora falta del agua, se ha convertido en la "llanura Miru-granero", "llanura Miru de felicidad".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a fracaso la politica hegemonica de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a fracaso la politica hegemonica de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Se puede decir laconicamente que la primera decada del nuevo milenio es el periodo en que se esta llevando al fracaso la politica de EE.UU. sobre la heguemonia y la unipolarizacion del mundo y se dan magnificas perspectivas de la independencia y la multipolarizacion del orbe.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 5 y continua:
					
					  Hasta en la primera mitad de esa decada, Estados Unidos se ufanaba y se mostraba extremadamente arrogante autoproclamandose como "unica superpotencia" del mundo. Pero, en la segunda mitad, se vio obligado a reconocer que ha cambiado la situacion.
					
					  En los ultimos 10 anos, acontecieron muchos cambios en las relaciones entre las fuerzas mundiales por diferentes causas, principalmente, la retirada de EE.UU. del Tratado sobre Misiles Antibalisticos, la guerra iraqui, la crisis financiera, etc.
					
					  Esta condenada al fracaso la politica de EE.UU. de lograr la unipolarizacion y la heguemonia en el mundo apoyandose en las fuerzas.
					
					  Al contrario, la verificacion de la independencia y la multipolarizacion del mundo se aceleran con rapidez siendo la corriente principal de la epoca.
					
					  La Union Europea, el Sudeste Asiatico, Africa y America Latina se encaminan con firmeza a la integracion y la unificacion regionales.
					
					  Mientras tanto, aparecen nuevos aparatos militares y economicos regionales, que excluyen a EE.UU.
					
					  En el sistema monetario internacional circulan nuevas monedas regionales, que se tornan cada vez mas influyentes debilitando al dolar norteamericano.
					
					  Ademas, gracias a la aparicion de la cumbre del G-20, en que participan tambien los paises en vias de desarrollo, crecen la influencia y la posicion de estos en el trato del problema economico mundial.
					
					  Por el contrario, EE.UU. esta cayendo en el atolladero cada vez mas profundo en Afganistan e Irak.
					
					  EE.UU. cancelo su plan de establecer el sistema antimisiles en Europa Oriental, y su politica de la heguemonia y la unipolarizacion del mundo esta criticada y rechazada por numerosos paises del planeta, incluyendo sus aliados.
					
					  Todos estos hechos comprueban que se va derrumbando de manera irremediable la posicion hegemonica de EE.UU. como "unica superpotencia" y la verificacion de independencia y la multipolarizacion del mundo constituyen la infrenable corriente de la epoca.
